thread.title: SpaceX to send two paying tourists around the moon and deep into space next year
thread.title_full: SpaceX to send two paying tourists around the moon and deep into space next year

author: Barney Henderson
title: SpaceX to send two paying tourists around the moon and deep into space next year
text:
S paceX has announced it will fly two paying customers on a tourist trip around the moon next year.
What will be the first-ever privately funded tourist flight beyond the International Space Station will use a spaceship under development for Nasa astronauts.
"Like the Apollo astronauts before them, these individuals will travel into space carrying the hopes and dreams of all humankind, driven by the universal human spirit of exploration," SpaceX said in a blog post.
Elon Musk Credit: ap E lon Musk, the SpaceX chief executive, said the two unnamed space tourists had already paid a large deposit for the trip and will undergo training and fitness tests later this year.
The flight would last about a week. the spaceship would circle the moon and then travel deeper into space before returning to Earth.
Musk would only say of the two customers that they know each other and that it is "nobody from Hollywood".
About | SpaceX “We expect to conduct health and fitness tests, as well as begin initial training later this year. Other flight teams have also expressed strong interest, and we expect more to follow. Additional information will be released about the flight teams, contingent upon their approval and confirmation of the health and fitness test results,” the SpaceX statement said.
Watch | Elon Musk’s rise to fame in 90 seconds 01:33
